MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB connection URL for persistent settings

ANTI_DELETE.description: Set true to show deleted messages.

ANTI_LINK.description: Set true for anti-link (warn then kick).

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true for always online.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true for automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true for automatic sticker.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Make it true for automatic status reaction.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true for auto reply on status.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply.

CHANNEL_ID.description: Your WhatsApp channel ID for auto-react.

CHANNEL_REACT_EMOJI.description: Emoji to react on channel posts.

AUTO_CHANNEL_REACT.description: Auto react to all channel posts.

OWNER_REACT_NUMBER.description: Number to auto-react on their messages.

OWNER_REACT_EMOJI.description: Emoji to react on owner messages.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put the owner number for bot.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true for auto delete bad words.

MENTION_REPLY.description: Make it true for mention reply.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true for auto recording.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true for auto typing.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true to react on every message.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make it true for custom reactions.

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: Change to 'same' for same chat or 'inbox'.

ADMIN_ACTION.description: Make it true to see admin activity.

WELCOME.description: Make it true for welcome message.

GOODBYE.description: Make it true for goodbye message.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true to auto read messages.
